entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
